text: Carl V. Thompson is an American engineer currently the Stavros Salapatas Professor of Materials Science and Engineering at Massachusetts Institute of Technology. ==Education== *SB, Materials Science and Engineering, MIT, 1976 *SM, Applied Physics, Harvard University, 1977 *PhD, Applied Physics, Harvard University, 1982 ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology faculty Category:Massachusetts Institute of Technology alumni Category:Harvard School of Engineering and Applied Sciences alumni
title: Carl V. Thompson
